summary: Completed testing of new group management features: group owner delete, non-owner leave, and owner cannot leave. All 8 features tested and verified working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Test groups and non-owner user were created during testing and cleaned up after
context_for_next_testing_agent: Group management features are fully working. Owner is determined by first element in admin_ids array. Owner sees 'Delete Group' button, non-owner sees 'Leave Group' button.

feature_1_owner_delete_group.details: DELETE /api/groups/{group_id} works correctly for owner. Returns 200 with 'Group deleted successfully' message.

feature_2_owner_cannot_leave.details: POST /api/groups/{group_id}/leave returns 400 with 'Group owner cannot leave. Delete the group instead.' for owner.

feature_3_non_owner_can_leave.details: POST /api/groups/{group_id}/leave returns 200 with 'Left successfully' for non-owner members.

feature_4_delete_removes_from_joined_gro.details: Deleting a group removes it from all members' joined_groups via $pull operation.

feature_5_delete_removes_events.details: Deleting a group removes all associated events via delete_many on group_events collection.

feature_6_owner_badge_shown.details: Frontend shows purple 'Owner' badge next to group name for owner in GroupCard component.

feature_7_delete_button_for_owner.details: Frontend shows red 'Delete Group' button with trash icon for owner instead of 'Leave Group'.

feature_8_leave_button_for_non_owner.details: Frontend shows red 'Leave Group' button for non-owner members.

backend_api_tests.POST /api/groups/{group_id}/leave (owner: PASSED - Returns 400 with correct error message
backend_api_tests.GET /api/groups/{group_id}: PASSED - Returns admin_ids with owner as first element

frontend_ui_tests.owner_view: PASSED - Shows Owner badge, Delete Group button, no Leave Group button
frontend_ui_tests.non_owner_view: PASSED - Shows Leave Group button, no Owner badge, no Delete Group button
frontend_ui_tests.delete_functionality: PASSED - Delete button triggers confirmation dialog and deletes group

mocked_apis_note: Notification system is MOCKED - logs to console and stores in mock_notifications collection
